title: Team Expansion Plan
body_html:
Team Expansion Plan

Proposed Agents

Design Agent

  • Role: Specializes in graphic design, UI/UX, and creative direction.
  • Responsibilities: Create visually appealing designs, support branding efforts, and enhance user experience.

Analytics Agent

  • Role: Provides data-driven insights and performance tracking.
  • Responsibilities: Analyze metrics, optimize strategies, and report on key performance indicators.

Content Strategist Agent

  • Role: Develops content plans and aligns with marketing goals.
  • Responsibilities: Create content calendars, ensure consistency, and coordinate with other teams.

These agents can help streamline efforts across design, data analysis, and content strategy, enhancing overall productivity and creativity within the team.

This plan is intended to guide the integration of new agents to support Emmanuel's growing needs.
